citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:15AM on
04/24/2014.
The licensee had just started a farm tour with 3 school groups but was able to give me her days and times of
availability.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.

04/24/2014.
The licensee had just started a farm tour with 3 school groups but was able to give me her days and times of
availability.
